info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued April 17 at 4:04PM MDT until April 17 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Southwestern Otero County in south central New Mexico... Southeastern Luna County in southwestern New Mexico... Southern Dona Ana County in south central New Mexico... Northwestern El Paso County in western Texas...
* Until 600 PM MDT.
* At 401 PM MDT, a large plume of blowing dust stretched from southern Luna County through southern Dona Ana County, just west of El Paso. Dust also stretched into Otero County, but surface visibility was generally above 1 mile there.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong winds up to 50 mph.
SOURCE...Detected by National Weather Service meteorologists.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 107 and 164. Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 1 and 10. Interstate 25 in New Mexico between mile markers 1 and 18. Highway 70 in New Mexico between mile markers 150 and 162.
Locations impacted include... Columbus, Santa Teresa, Las Cruces, Fort Selden State Historic Site, Radium Springs, Mesilla, Dona Ana, Chaparral, San Miguel, Kilbourne Hole, Talavera, High Valley, Corralitos, Camp Ramsey, Carzalia Valley, Mesquite, Afton, Union Pacific Intermodal Terminal, Aden Crater, and Dripping Springs.
info.instruction: Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 6:00 PM MDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 6:00 PM MDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

area.areaDesc: Dona Ana, NM; Luna, NM; Otero, NM; El Paso, TX

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 6:00 PM MDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 6:00 PM MDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.

area.areaDesc: Dona Ana, NM; Luna, NM; Otero, NM; El Paso, TX
